linkedin.notes: Collect only publicly shared business contact signals; honour profile opt-outs.

clearbit.notes: Ensure subscription covers enrichment purpose and respect Clearbit caching and deletion windows.

aviation_registry.notes: Data restricted to fleet composition; do not store personal crew details.

cipc.notes: Respect published API rate limits and cache results for seven days; director information must only be processed for business contact purposes.

sacaa.notes: Limit lookups to operational records, honour SACAA acceptable use, and purge cached payloads when certificates expire.
